title: IMMIGRATION PANEL KEEPS PALESTINIAN IN JAIL
body:
Immigration and Naturalization Service successfully appeals Judge R Kevin McHugh's order releasing Mazen Al-
Najjar, Palestinian who has been jailed for three years without charges on evidence that government will not 
disclose; government says three Florida organizations with which Al-Najjar is associated are fronts for Islamic 
Jihad, which has claimed responsibility for terrorist bombings (S)
